Help.Description:
Adds a message to your highlight list.
If a message matches, it will be colored accordingly to the given color code(s).
See the entry on #action for information about the available regular expression options.
The '%0' argument shouldn't be used in the message part.
Available color codes are: reset, light, faint, underscore, blink, reverse, dim, black, red, green, yellow, blue, magenta, cyan, white, b black, b red, b green, b yellow, b blue, b magenta, b cyan, b white.
Help.Example: Highlights lines starting with 'You ' and 'Your ' in light cyan.
Help.Notes: Use of color codes for xterm 256 color are also supported. Reemove highlights with the '#unhighlight' command.
